profile.title: Yaqa qillqiri uñacht’awi
profile.noPrivateKey: Aka yänakana janiwa privadu llave utjkiti apxatañataki.
profile.importFailed: Janiwa llave apkataskiti (chimpu pantjata jan ukax qillqata ch’iqhi).
profile.keysRotated: Machaq llave paya chimpu sartatawa ukhamaraki público llave apxatata.
profile.keyDisclaimer: Privadu llavemaxa janiw aka yänak qhiparu mistkiti. Yaqha yänakana kutxatayañataki chimputaki imata kopa apxatam.
profile.themeFreeNotice: Free ukankta — akana Inti/Phaxsi (Sun/Moon) mä jank’u ajlliñanakawa. Juk’ampi temas mayacht’añataki jach’arjamañataki jithstatam.
profile.backupDesc: Llavenakam imata wakicham chimputaki, ukat yaqha yänakana kutxañataki apanaqama.
profile.privacyBlurOnUnfocus: Aplicación jani nayraqataru utjki ukhaxa llant’aña
profile.followHint: Jupanakan qillqatanakaxa ‘Followers’ jan ukax ‘Public’ ukan qillqt’asa, ‘Following’ ukan uñjastani.
profile.callTextForwardingDescription: Mantañani jawsañanakasa qillqañanakasa uñt’at telefonu jan ukax correo ukaru. Mistuñatakixa Chatforia jakhu uñachayasispa.
profile.errSmsDest: Sapa maya destino ajllima (telefonu jan ukax correo).

chat.selectPrompt: Qillqaña qalltañataki mä qillqata jan ukax ch’aman uta ajllima
chat.emptySubtitle: Mä yatiyawi apayaña ukhamarak mä aruskipäwi qalltaña.

auth.headline: Ch’amañchaña, markachiri aruskipäwi ukat jank’a jaqukipawi
auth.description: Tukuy tukuyar ch’amañchaña, IA jaqukipawi, chhaqiri yatiyawinaka, ukat aruskipäwi jawsaña/viyu.

feature.privacy: Jark’aqawi nayraqata. Juma yatiyama, juma amtama.

auth.desktopTip: Ordenadorampit qamasma? Telefunomamp escaneam aplicación katjañataki.
auth.subhead: Privadu, ch’amañchatäwi, ukat jank’a jaqukipawi — uka pachpacha.
auth.tip: Chatforia taqi yänakana apnaqasma — jan ukasti aplicación apasma suma qamañataki.
auth.scanHint: Aplicación apkatänañataki jan ukasti navegadoran jist’arañataki escaneama.

home.title: Uta
home.subheader: Mä yatiyawi apayañam ukhama aruskipäwi qalltam.

press.title: Waraqatanaka
press.contactText: For media inquiries, reach us at press@chatforia.com.
press.boilerplateText: Chatforia is a secure messenger with instant translation and E2E encryption, designed to make global conversations private and effortless.
press.assetsText: Logonaka, pantallanakapa, ukat producto uñacht’awinaka (utjini qhipa).

careers.title: Iruñanakapa
careers.intro: Jiska tamañani jichhax aruskipäwi markachir mä wakichäwi lurapjjtwa. Jichhax ch’amañchaña, atinxaña, sum qamawi UI jupanakampiw wali cuidanipta.
careers.openRoles: Ch’amanaka qhantatäpxi: Ingeniería (full-stack, iOS, Android), Producto, Apoyo.

about.title: Chatforia tuqita
about.description: Chatforia mä ch’amañchatäni, walja arunaka jaqukipiri aruskipirawa; tukuyar ch’amañchaña, jank’a jaqukipawi, ukat jawsaña/viyu. Amtäwinakasaxa jichhaki: jaqinakar amuyt’ayaña — ch’amanchata, jark’aqata, ukat arunak qhantayañampi.
about.howDescription: Yatiyawinaka jumar uñt’ata yänakankiwa qhiparu mistuñapataki. Jaqukipawi, imata wakichawi, chiqa wakt’awi — aka servidoranakaru jani yatiñapataki ukham qillqata.

advertise.title: Chatforiampi anunsiyaña
advertise.description: Aruskipir apnaqirinakamp chiqapa, suma uñacht’ata uñstasirinakampi chikañchasiña. Bannernaka, patrocinionaka, ukat jupanakaw uñacht’añani. Premium apnaqirinakax janiw anunsi uñjapxiti.

adsense.withPubId: Jichhax Google AdSenseampiw anunsi apnaqapxta. Google Adsamp thaqsmawa, publisher ID {{pubId}} apnaqasa ukat aka uñt’ayatanak mayt’asa. Directo patrocinionakaxa utji — formulario apnaqama.
adsense.noPubId: Jichhax Google AdSenseampiw anunsi apnaqapxta. Directo patrocinionakaxa utji — formulario ukar qillqama.

advertise.noPlacements: Janiw uñacht’ayañanaka wakichatäkiti. ads/placements.js ukaru yapxatam.

why.highSession: Sapa kuti jaya qhipa apnaqawi ukat taypi wakt’ayawi
why.deals: Tratonaka directo jan ukasti programático AdSense/Google Adsamp

form.submittedMsg: Yuspajarapxsma! Mä qillqata uñstayxiwa. Qhiparu jupanakaw mayt’apxsma.

upgrade.title: Jach’achaña
upgrade.subtitle: Ajlliña suma planam: Plusamp anunsi jani, jan ukasti Premiumamp ch’amañchañanaka.

gettingStarted.title: Qalltañataki
gettingStarted.subtitle: Chatforia ukar machaqtati? Aka jisk’a qullqimpi jank’a suma apnaqañani.

alert.text: Aka guía jichhak qhiparu jach’aniwa. Kunäsa jani utjki ukhaxa,

section2.title: 2) Qallta aruskipaña
section2.item1: DM jan ukax Grupo luraña ukat nayrïr yatiyawi apayaña.
section2.item3: Perfil → Jark’aqawi ukana chhaqiri yatiyawi ukat read receipts yant’ama.

section3.title: 3) Juk’ampi
section3.item1Part2: laphi (Plus = jani anunsi, Premium = taqi ch’amañchaña).
section3.item2Part1: Yaqha yänaka wakt’aña ukat imata wakichaña

account.q: Kunjamsa cuentaxa lurasi jan ukasti kutxasi?
account.a: Aplicación apasma jan ukasti web apnaqasma, “Cuenta luraña” niyama limt’ama, correom/telefonum uñt’ayaña. Kutxañataki, “Chimpu armata” apnaqama.

privacy.a: Jisa. Yatiyawi ukat jawsañanakax qalltäwitpacha ch’amañchatakiwa. Juma ukat katuqiriw uñt’añapa.

translate.a: Ajustes → Uñacht’awi & Aru ukana “Jank’a jaqukipaña” naktayama. Aparatompix utjki ukhaxa ch’iqpacha, jan ukasti seguridad APInaka apnaqasi.

contact.a: Qillqapxam support@chatforia.com ukaru. Pantallanaka ukat aplicación versioma apayañam.

intro.body: This Privacy Policy explains how Chatforia (“we”, “us”) collects, uses, and shares information when you use our apps and services. We design Chatforia to minimize the data we can access.

infoWeCollect.title: Information we collect
infoWeCollect.account: Account info (e.g., email/phone) to create and secure your account.
infoWeCollect.encrypted: Encrypted content (messages/calls) is end-to-end encrypted; we can’t read it.
infoWeCollect.diagnostics: Diagnostic/usage like crash logs, device type, or coarse analytics to improve performance.

howWeUse.title: How we use information
howWeUse.provide: Provide and secure the service (auth, spam/abuse detection).

sharing.title: Sharing
sharing.body: We don’t sell personal data. We may share limited data with processors (e.g., push notifications, analytics) under strict contracts.

rights.title: Your rights
rights.body: Depending on your region (e.g., GDPR/UK GDPR/CPRA), you may request access, correction, deletion, or opt-out of certain processing. Contact: privacy@chatforia.com.

retention.title: Data retention & security
retention.body: We retain only what’s needed to operate the service and apply industry-standard security. E2E content can’t be decrypted by us.

children.title: Children
children.body: Chatforia isn’t directed to children under 13 (or as required by your local law).

changes.title: Changes
changes.body: We’ll post updates here and revise the “Last updated” date.

intro.body: By using Chatforia you agree to these Terms. If you do not agree, don’t use the service.

accounts.title: Accounts
accounts.itemAccurateInfo: Provide accurate info and keep credentials secure.
accounts.itemResponsibility: You’re responsible for activity on your account.

acceptableUse.title: Acceptable use
acceptableUse.itemNoAbuse: No illegal, abusive, or infringing content; no spam or automated abuse.

yourContent.title: Your content
yourContent.body: You retain rights to your content. You grant us necessary rights to operate the service (e.g., routing, storage, translation).

disclaimer.title: Disclaimers & liability
disclaimer.body: Service is provided “as is” without warranties. To the fullest extent permitted by law, Chatforia isn’t liable for indirect or consequential damages.

changes.title: Changes
changes.body: We may update these terms; continued use after changes means acceptance.

doNotSell.title: Do Not Sell or Share My Personal Information
doNotSell.body: Chatforia does not sell personal information. California residents can still submit requests under CPRA using the button below.

cookies.title: Cookie Settings
cookies.body: Chatforia uses minimal cookies (e.g., session, security). We don’t use third-party ads cookies. Manage cookies via your browser’s settings.

phoneNumberManager.noNumberAssigned: Janiw mä jakhüru utjkiti. Área codempita ajllima qhantayañataki.

startChatModal.title: Mä aruskipäwi qalltaña
startChatModal.nameUsernamePhoneEmail: Suti, usuario, telefonu jan ukax correo qillqama…
startChatModal.searchPrompt: Mä usuario jan ukax telefonu qillqama ukat ‘Thaqaña’ limt’ama.
startChatModal.saveContactsHint: Telefonu/correo qillqatanakaxa contactonakjama imxatasaw qhiparu apnaqatäni.

sounds.freeNotice: Free ukankta — premium toquenakax uñacht’ayasiwa ukampisa jark’aqata. Jach’achama taqi jist’arañataki.

aiSettings.title: IA Ajustes
aiSettings.controlIntro: Jaqukipaña, wakiyi kutiyawi, ukat ForiaBot mä janiwa utjkiti ch’amanchäwinaka apnaqam.
aiSettings.smartRepliesHint: Qhiparu katuqata yatiyawinaka (limpia) IA ukaru apayañama jank’a kutiyawimataki.
aiSettings.maskProfanity: Jan wali aru imt’aña IA kutiyawinanxa
aiSettings.maskProfanityHint: Naktayatasti, IA kutiyawinakax chimpuntat aru imt’aniwa

accessibilitySettings.title: Atinxaña & Alirtanaka
accessibilitySettings.interfaceFontSizeHelp: Qalltatpacha normalawa. Jilañcht’asma atinxañana jila qillqa munsta ukhaxa.
accessibilitySettings.notificationsDesc:
Uñacht’ata alirtanaka yatiyawinakatsa jawsañanakataki
Bannernaka ukat título parpadeo uñachayaña.
accessibilitySettings.vibrateOnNew:
Machaq yatiyawinakana vibrar (utjkixpan)
Yatiyawi ukana vibración naktayaña.
accessibilitySettings.flashOnCall:
Jawsaña jutki ukhaxa pantall rusa
Mä jakhthapi jach’a qhana.
accessibilitySettings.autoTranscribeVoiceNotes:
Voz yatiyawinaka jank’a qillqachaña
Mä transcripción yapxataña.

privacySection.ciphertextOnlyNote: Servidoranxa janiw qhana qillqata imaskti — ciphertextaki. IA/Jaqukipawi ukat uñakipawi janiwa apnaqkiti.

peoplePage.searchPlaceholder: Alias, suti, usuario jan ukax telefonump thaqaña
peoplePage.findOrAdd: Thaqaña jan ukax mä jaqi yapxataña
peoplePage.syncTip: Ammatäwi: Yatiyawinakamax web ukat móvil taypina chiqa wakt’ayatawa.

randomChat.title: Sapaq aruskipäwi
randomChat.description: Juk’ampi mä machaq jaqimpi jank’a aruskipañani. Jikxatayañäni ukat mä temporal chat jist’aräni.
